description.en: Count number of car fleets that will arrive at destination.
description.zh-CN: [题目853] Count number of car fleets that will arrive at des...
description.zh-TW: [題目853] Count number of car fleets that will arrive at des...
description.ja: [問題853] Count number of car fleets that will arrive at des...
description.es: [Problema 853] Count number of car fleets that will arrive at des...

description.fr: [Problème 853] Count number of car fleets that will arrive at des...

explanation.en: APL solution for Car Fleet. Uses grade (⍋/⍒) for sorting - returns indices that would sort the array. Uses scan (\) to compute running operations: +\ is running sum, ×\ is running product, ⌈\ is running max, ⌊\ is running min. Uses where (⍸) to find indices of true/non-zero elements. Uses tally (≢) to count array length. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.zh-CN: Car Fleet 的 APL 解决方案。使用等级 (⍋/⍒) 排序 - 返回将对数组排序的索引。使用扫描 (\) 计算运行操作：+\ 是运行和，×\ 是运行积，⌈\ 是运行最大值，⌊\ 是运行最小值。使用 where (⍸) 查找真值/非零元素的索引。使用 tally (≢) 计算数组长度。实现使用 APL 的面向数组原语进行简洁表达。
explanation.zh-TW: Car Fleet 的 APL 解決方案。使用等級 (⍋/⍒) 排序 - 返回將對陣列排序的索引。使用掃描 (\) 計算運行操作：+\ 是運行和，×\ 是運行積，⌈\ 是運行最大值，⌊\ 是運行最小值。使用 where (⍸) 查找真值/非零元素的索引。使用 tally (≢) 計算陣列長度。實現使用 APL 的面向陣列原語進行簡潔表達。
explanation.ja: APL solution for Car Fleet. Uses grade (⍋/⍒) for sorting - returns indices that would sort the array. Uses scan (\) to compute running operations: +\ is running sum, ×\ is running product, ⌈\ is running max, ⌊\ is running min. Uses where (⍸) to find indices of true/non-zero elements. Uses tally (≢) to count array length. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
